name: Opti Llum
description:
An alien-girl's home breaks apart.  She wishes for it in one piece again. Help her to get to the home again, but watch your step - the journey is dangerous!

CONTROLS

[Left-Click the orb to start the game!]

[Controls: WASD and ←↑↓→ to Move]

[SHIFT loads your last checkpoint]

Blank Canvas drew out the alien girl in detail
Visit Her Page: https://blankcanvassyndrome.itch.io/

Shoutout to Neil for motivation, inspiration and playtesting!
Visit His Page: https://zombievirals.itch.io/
